resources.string:
Welcome to Potluck!

Enter your ingredients, separated by commas and spaces, in their most general and singular form. For instance, enter "cheese" instead of "cheddar." We will match you with recipes when you own at least half of their ingredients.

Let's get cooking!

string-array.name: recipes
string-array.item: Pesto Pasta, flour, egg, basil, oil, nuts, cheese, .
Pizza, flour, egg, yeast, tomato, onion, cheese, .
Eggplant Parmagiana, eggplant, tomato, onion, garlic, bread, cheese, .
Macaroni and Cheese, flour, egg, cheese, milk. .
Shrimp Risotto, rice, chicken stock, shrimp, wine, .
Tomato Soup, tomato, oil, butter, garlic, onion, thyme, .
Chicken Burrito, tortilla, chicken, tomato, onion, pepper, guacomole, sour cream, .
Burger, bread, beef, tomato, lettuce, onion, .
Pulled Pork, bread, pork, rootbeer, barbeque sauce, .
Steamed Mussels, mussel, wine, thyme, chicken broth, .
